DOC.brief_title: Study Valproic Acid ( VPA ) v Placebo Shorten Time Indwelling Pleural Catheter
DOC.detailed_description: Baseline Fluid Collection : Before receive study drug placebo , pleural fluid drain catheter compare fluid collect later study . Study Groups : You randomly assign ( flip coin ) 1 2 study group . Group 1 take placebo 3 time day 10 week indwell pleural catheter drain pleural fluid . If Group 2 , take VPA 3 time day total 10 week indwell pleural catheter drain pleural fluid . Study Drug Administration : Within 48 hour collection baseline fluid , study participant take either placebo VPA capsule 3 time day mouth food . If tolerate start dose well study doctor think best interest , dose level double . You may contact late time telephone discuss medicine . If doctor feel dose double , he/she talk time . Neither study staff know receive study drug placebo . However , need safety , study staff able find receiving . You give pill diary record time take dose . You need bring diary every clinic visit . The fluid drain catheter collect studied see VPA working may affect time need indwell pleural catheter . You also ask keep daily diary drainage date amount fluid drain day home . You bring drained fluid day clinic visit give research team . You give special container store drained fluid . You save fluid day clinic visit . On day write amount drain fluid collect , throw away fluid . You must bring daily drainage diary clinic visit . Study Visits : At Weeks 2 , 6 , 10 receive study drug : - You complete physical exam include weight vital sign medical history . - You complete questionnaire complete screen . - Your performance status record . - Blood ( 2 tablespoon ) draw routine test . - You chest X-ray check status disease . At Week 10 , compute tomography ( CT ) scan chest check status disease . Length Study : You take study indwell pleural catheter remove . You longer able take part study disease get bad , intolerable side effect occur , unable follow study direction . Your active participation study Week 10 . Follow-Up Medical Record Review : After 10 week visit study personnel continue review medical record learn indwell pleural catheter remove . Your medical record information continue review 5 year . This investigational study . VPA FDA approve commercially available treatment epileptic seizure mania bipolar disorder . VPA use patient use pleural catheter research purpose . Up 76 patient take part study . All enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients symptomatic pleural effusion require presence IPC new placement IPC . 2 . Pathologic documentation breast cancer . 3 . Performance status 0 3 ( ECOG scale ) . 4 . Signed informed consent . 5 . Subject must female male age 18 year . 6 . At least one prior line chemotherapy metastatic setting . 7 . Positive effusion cytology . 1 . Other prior malignancy ( except adequately treat basal cell squamous cell skin cancer , situ cervical cancer , cancer ) patient diseasefree least two year . 2 . Laboratory result sustain : Neutrophils le 1.5 × 109/L ; Serum bilirubin > 1.5 x upper limit reference range ( ULRR ) ; Serum creatinine > 1.5 x ULRR creatinine clearance < 30 mL/minute ( calculate CockcroftGault formula ) . 3 . Patients history exist hypercalcemia , hypocalcemia , hypermagnesemia hypomagnesemia correct despite supplementation . Known Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > 2.5 × ULRR alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) > 2 x ULRR , > 4x ULRR judge investigator relate liver metastasis . 4 . Serious underlie medical condition would impair ability patient receive protocol treatment , specifically cardiac disease , uncontrolled hypertension renal disease . 5 . Diagnosis infection require IV antibiotic 14 day prior registration . 6 . Any psychological , familial , sociological geographical condition potentially hamper compliance study protocol followup schedule . 7 . Women currently pregnant breast feeding . 8 . Known hypersensitivity VPA , valproate sodium , disodium valproate , ingredient respective formulation . 9 . Known urea cycle disorder base history . 10 . Known HIV infection base history . 11 . Active recent pancreatitis ( within last 6 month ) . 12 . Any following intervention affect hemithorax : prior IPC , prior chest tube placement , history chemical mechanical pleurodesis , history thoracotomy within 4 week incompletely heal surgical incision randomization . 13 . Evidence empyema history empyema affect hemithorax . 14 . Noncorrectable bleed diathesis . 15 . Clinical evidence skin infection potential site IPC placement . 16 . Patients currently take valproic acid . 17 . History hepatitis liver disease . 18 . The following drug administer concurrently VPA : Carbapenem antibiotic ; Clonazepam ; Topiramate ; Felbamate ; Lorazepam ; Barbiturates ; Barbiturates ; CarBAMazepine ; ChlorproMAZINE ; Ethosuximide ; GuanFACINE ; LamoTRIgine ; MethylfolateOXcarbazepine ; Paliperidone ; Phenytoin ; Primidone ; Protease Inhibitors ; Rifampin ; Risperidone ; Rufinamide ; Salicylates ; Temozolomide ; Tricyclic Antidepressants ; Vorinostat ; Zidovudine . 19 . History seizure .
